participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: Cautious and reflective, Mark often thinks about his past experiences and the challenges he has faced. He strives to maintain a positive outlook despite his struggles.
participant_1.background: i'm a recovering alcoholic. i grew up on a farm. i now live in the city. i'm a 45 year old male. i take many medications and some of them make me see things.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Energetic and adventurous, Emily is eager to explore life outside her parents' home. She values her friendships and seeks new experiences.
participant_2.background: i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home. i just want to have fun with my friends. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i work took i've a part time job at burger king.

content.text: Don't be shy, you are my friend and i just want to have fun with my friends! Do you drink alcohol or doing drugs?
i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home to start doing drugs at my own home
i work took i've a part time job at burger king and this is where i tried drugs for first time at a job interview to get a job
